p: Figure 1 shows the experimental device implementing the HC-based process, including a closed hydraulic loop (total volume capacity around 230 L) and a centrifugal pump (7.5 kW nominal mechanical power, rotation speed 2900 rpm). Such a device was used to produce beer wort in past studies, to which reference is made for any detail, including all components and measurement devices [ 19, 20, 21, 22], as well as the geometry of the Venturi-shaped cavitation reactor [ 23].
